Class Critter

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment5.Critter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlgaephobicCritter, Craig, Critter.TestCritter, GreedyCritter, HungryCritter, TimidCritter

    public abstract class Critter
extends java.lang.Object

      static void worldTimeStep()
      This method performs the timestep for each Critter as follows Allow each Critter to perform individual timestep Determine locations of multiple Critters (where conflicts happen) Resolve conflicts such that each Critter can run before the fight, removing the loser Remove all Critters that are dead from world Add new Algae and babies to world

        private void moveInDirection(int direction,
                             int distance)
        Internal method for moving a Critter a given number of tiles in a given direction Only allows one movement per time step
        Parameters:
        direction - integer in range [0,7] corresponding to a direction
        distance - number of squares to travel

      • makeCritter

        public static void makeCritter(java.lang.String critter_class_name)
                        throws InvalidCritterException
        create and initialize a Critter subclass. critter_class_name must be the unqualified name of a concrete subclass of Critter, if not, an InvalidCritterException must be thrown. (Java weirdness: Exception throwing does not work properly if the parameter has lower-case instead of upper. For example, if craig is supplied instead of Craig, an error is thrown instead of an Exception.)
        Parameters:
        critter_class_name -
        Throws:
        InvalidCritterException

      • getInstances

        public static java.util.List<Critter> getInstances(java.lang.String critter_class_name)
                                            throws InvalidCritterException
        Gets a list of critters of a specific type.
        Parameters:
        critter_class_name - What kind of Critter is to be listed. Unqualified class name.
        Returns:
        List of Critters.
        Throws:
        InvalidCritterException

      • runStats

        public static void runStats(java.util.List<Critter> critters)

        Parameters:
        critters - List of Critters.

      • updateHash

        private static void updateHash(Critter c,
                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.LinkedList<Critter>> hash)
        This method calculates the hash for Critter c and adds it to the ArrayList in the HashMap hash If no ArrayList exists at the hash a new one will be created
        Parameters:
        c - the Critter to add to the HashMap
        hash - the HashMap the Critter should be added to

      • worldTimeStep

        public static void worldTimeStep()
        This method performs the timestep for each Critter as follows Allow each Critter to perform individual timestep Determine locations of multiple Critters (where conflicts happen) Resolve conflicts such that each Critter can run before the fight, removing the loser Remove all Critters that are dead from world Add new Algae and babies to world

        private static javafx.scene.shape.Shape getIcon(Critter.CritterShape shapeIndex)

        public static void displayWorld()
        This method prints the world borders and Critters in the world to the screen Typical use case is to be called from show command.
